  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3083</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Scanning the Heart for Symptoms</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Absuchen des Inneren für Symptome</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Balayage du coeur pour des symptômes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fazendo a varredura do coração para sintomas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esplorazione del cuore per i sintomi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανίχνευση της καρδιάς για τα συμπτώματα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Exploración del corazón para los síntomas</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This video shows how the heart and its blood vessels can be scanned, and used to diagnose</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heart</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cardiology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">radiology</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieser Bildschirm zeigt, wie das Innere und seine
$blutgefässe abgesucht werden können, und verwendet worden zu 
bestimmen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce vidéo montre comment le coeur et ses 
vaisseaux sanguins peuvent être balayés, et utilisé pour 
diagnostiquer</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este vídeo mostra como o coração e suas 
embarcações de sangue podem ser feitos a varredura, e usado 
diagnosticar</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo video mostra come il cuore ed i relativi 
vasi sanguigni possono essere esplorati ed usato per diagnosticare</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το βίντεο επιδεικνύει πώς η καρδιά και τα σκάφη
αίματός της μπορούν να ανιχνευθούν, και να χρησιμοποιηθούν για να
εντοπίσουν</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este vídeo muestra cómo el corazón y sus vasos
sanguíneos pueden ser explorados, y utilizado diagnosticar</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Inneres</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
